alert.note: Alert for Russell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 5:44PM CDT until June 05 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Russell County in central Kansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 544 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Natoma, or 16 miles north of Russell, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Luray, Paradise and Waldo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
